content.text: 1 1/2 cups dried black-eyed peas, soaked overnight
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 1/2 cups dried black-eyed peas, soaked overnight" )
( ing-1 "1/3 cup chopped celery, with leaves" )
( ing-2 "1 1/2 cups shredded carrot" )
( ing-3 "3/4 cup chopped fresh parsley" )
( ing-4 "1/2 cup chopped white onion" )
( ing-5 "1/8 cup chopped fresh mint" )
( ing-6 "1/4 cup olive oil" )
( ing-7 "2 oranges, juiced" )
( ing-8 "1/2 lemon, juiced" )
( ing-9 "1 garlic clove, pressed" )
( ing-10 "1/2 teaspoon ground coriander" )
( ing-11 "1/2 teaspoon salt" )
( ing-12 "1/8 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper" )
( ing-13 "1 teaspoon brown sugar" )

content.text: 0) Place the beans in a saucepan with enough water to cover them by one inch.
1) Bring beans to a slow boil.
2) Reduce heat to low, and simmer until tender but not mushy (about 35 minutes).
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Reduce"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( "heat"@10:14 / OTHER )
		:gol ( temp-2-0 "low"@18:21 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-1 "simmer"@27:33 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-2-0 "until tender but not mushy"@34:60 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:duration ( dur-2-0 "35 minutes"@68:78 / DUR )
	)
)

content.text: 4) When the beans have cooled, place them in a large bowl.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "place"@31:36 / AC
		:ppt ( "them"@37:41 / PRONOUN )
		:gol ( tool-4-0 "a large bowl"@45:57 / TOOL )
		:when ( cond-4-0 "When the beans have cooled"@3:29 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Add the celery, carrots, parsley, white onion, and mint; toss to blend.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "the celery"@7:17 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "carrots"@19:26 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "parsley"@28:35 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "white onion"@37:48 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "mint"@54:58 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-5-1 "toss"@60:64 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:prp ( purp-5-0 "to blend"@65:73 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 6) For dressing, blend olive oil, orange and lemon juice, garlic, coriander, salt, pepper, and brown sugar in a blender for 6 seconds.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "blend"@17:22 / AC
		:subtask ( "For dressing"@-1:-1 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "olive oil"@23:32 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "orange and lemon juice"@34:56 / FOOD
			:ref ( ing-7 )
			:ref ( ing-8 )
		)
		:ppt ( ing-9 "garlic"@58:64 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-10 "coriander"@66:75 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-11 "salt"@77:81 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-12 "pepper"@83:89 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-13 "brown sugar"@95:106 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-6-0 "a blender"@110:119 / TOOL )
		:duration ( dur-6-0 "6 seconds"@124:133 / DUR )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Transfer to a small saucepan, and simmer over low heat for five minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Transfer"@3:11 / AC
		:gol ( tool-7-0 "a small saucepan"@15:31 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-7-1 "simmer"@37:43 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:heat ( temp-7-0 "low heat"@49:57 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-7-0 "five minutes"@62:74 / DUR )
	)
)

content.text: 9) Pour dressing over the bean salad, and refrigerate for at least 1 hour before serving.
content.eamr:
( inst-9 / R
	:inform ( ac-9-0 "Pour"@-1:-1 / AC
		:ppt ( "dressing"@-1:-1 / FOOD )
		:gol ( "the bean salad"@-1:-1 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-9-1 "refrigerate"@-1:-1 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-9-0 "at least 1 hour"@-1:-1 / DUR )
		:duration ( cond-9-0 "before serving"@-1:-1 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)
